reviewText: I'm used to Cheez-its, so these were a bit spicy at first, but after a couple of tries I found I like them. Better than the regular cheese one, in fact. They're certainly more expensive than other crackers, but they're healthier and they taste like a good snack, not like cardboard. I would rather they came in a box sized to the amount (or an amount sized to the box), but I plan to buy more in the future.
I have to watch my calorie and carb intake.  These crackers are substantially lower in both and they're good too.  The nutrition info says it all.  (I just have to remember portion control.)

I was delighted when I discovered that FiberGourmet, which makes an amazing low-cal pasta (FiberGourmet Light Spaghetti), also makes crackers. I first ordered a single box of the plain Cheese Thinables and found them to be excellent, so I decided to try the Nacho flavor. First, there are a lot of crackers in the one ounce serving (unlike those teensy tiny 100 calorie packs). And the nutrition stats are excellent: Nabisco Cheese Nips have 140 calories per ounce and less than a gram of fiber versus Thinables 60 calories per ounce with 11 grams of fiber. They are a very good substitute for higher calorie snacks and are more filling. I like a serving on the side of a sandwich for lunch, or with yogurt for breakfast. I ordered the Nacho Thinables hoping for a more intense flavor. These do have a spicy note to them but the cheese flavor is still weak compared to regular Cheez-Its. I do like them, but I prefer the Fiber Gourmet Cheese Thinables because the "Nacho" flavor in these actually overpowers the "cheese" flavor. Overall, I highly recommend these crackers (and the pasta!) and intend to try the Cinnamon Sugar flavor.

For something a little different - nacho flavor !  I just love these crackers.  1/2 the calories of regular cheese crackers.  Thin and crunchy and full of fiber to leave you feeling fuller for longer.  Nice nacho cheese taste.

I am a diabetic and my blood sugar shot sky high after eating these crackers.  The only way this can happen is if the fiber claim is not correct.  I subtracted the listed fiber content when calculating my insulin for this snack, and when I tested my blood sugar over an hour later it was 280 !!!  Insoluble fiber will not raise blood sugar because the body doesn't digest it and convert to glucose, therefore I find it highly doubtful that they really contain the stated quantity of insoluble fiber.
summary: Beware - Sincere Doubts On the Fiber Claims

reviewText: Nothing better for a dieter.  30 crackers = 60 calories and a lot of fiber.  Spicy taste.  If you are an iDieter, these are a nice option to the wheat and cheese types.

I have my problems...I can really binge on crackers, for one thing.  At least with these, I do get full before the entire box is gone. And the calories are half what ordinary crackers have so...less damage done too.  Flavorwise, they are waaay bingeable  ;o)
These have a great taste and really are more filling then similar "cheese squares"!  The "nacho" flavor has a great cheesy and slightly spicy taste (but not too spicy).  Highly recommend!

I have become a fan of Fiber Gourmet.  I really like the cinnamon and cheese thinables.  I had hesitated to try the Nacho variety, but recently decided to give them a try when they were one of my Quick Picks.  Personally, I like the regular cheese better, but I'm not a strong flavor enthusiast.  Fortunately, the nacho ones are not that strong.  I have even added them to my subscribe and save order, especially since the regular cheese ones may not be available.

I do have to say that the Fiber Gourmet crackers grow on me.  When I first try them, I'm not real impressed, but the more I have them, the more I like them.  This was especially true of the cinnamon variety.  Now, I'm hooked on them and don't want to run out!
Just OK

I thought this would taste like garlic, but it doesn't even smell like it. I added it to a salad and hummus, but there's almost zero garlic flavor or smell. Not even all that much olive oil flavor. Disappointed.

I just rec'd my bottle today--right after seeing the first and only review, a negative one, ouch. Before I open this, I have another brand garlic EVOO I have to use up first...so I cannot speak to that yet, and will update my review when I do...but I can say at least that the "best use by" date iS listed here, Dec 2015, and it a pet peeve of mine when oil bottles do not list it. So I am glad this one did.  Olive oil doesn't get better with age, so I want to know if it's fresh. Also, there are no food allergens in this oil.  Believe it or not I found out by accident that some olive oils are made in a facility, sometimes using shared equipment, with food allergens such as soy, dairy, and nuts to name a few.  I cannot use it bc of this bc my 7-yr-old g'daughter is allergic.  When I order EVOO, it is an expectation that it is safe to use. I order EVOO online expecting it to be 'pure' and free of dangerous allergens, only to find that in a few rare instances, that there are brands of oil that I have to steer clear of and they do not state the presence of allergens at point of purchase. So luckily, this olive oil is free from food allergens.

In short, yes, it is the taste of the oil that is important, but to me, so too is freshness and even moreso, safety.  I love Olio Santo brand garlic EVOO, from Wms-Sonoma, but you can't always find it from them or even here on Amazon, so I am in the searching phase of finding another good brand of garlic EVOO to fall back on. I hope I am not as disappointed as is the other reviewer once I open the bottle and test it out.  Will update my review for certain then.
good
Using this one all my foods.
This is the best olive oil.  Not only is it Infused with an adequate amount of garlic, the container is wonderful.  The container has a self limiting pour.
summary: Wonderful oil, in a prize winning container

High power of heat and gives food a kick of fire and flavor with a little dash. Great on BBQ

reviewText: If you're a habanero fan, these flakes are for you. They are HOT, but they have great flavor too! We put them on everything here in our household!  This size will probably last us a year, it's big and worth every penny.
summary: but they have great flavor too

reviewText: This is good but the dispensing lid could be better. Give us the option of larger holes on the lid. As it is you barely get the flakes out, only the fine habanero pepper dust.

This stuff is hot.  Don't mistake this for those "red pepper flakes" that you get at pizza places.  Use these flakes sparingly.  Even the smell will irritate your sinuses. The dust from this will make you cough.  Having said all this - this is an excellent product.  You just have to respect it.
Love it.
Great heat, good price, very convenient.
Good product good seller

I bought both the Ghost Peeper flakes and the Habanero flakes to season, well, everything I eat. The benefit of these spices is they can add a lot of heat without altering the flavor too much like adding pickled jalapeos does. The ghost peppers are good but can be easily over done. With the Habanero flakes you don't have as high a chance of getting 'hot spots', places that get a few flakes where other bites had no flakes. That happens with the Ghost Peppers. But with the Ghost Peppers a little bit goes a long way, so the whole container will last a long time. At this rate between the two containers, eating them almost every day I can expect them to last maybe a couple years. It's a great value. Sonoran Spice Ghost Pepper Flakes, 8 Ounce
These are amazing. Although be careful when you first open them, I got habanero dust in my eye and nose, and that was an intense 45 minutes.
Adds nice heat, while keeping the citrus notes of the Habanero.

I tried this once before on Amazon and my family really loves it because it is good for any pasta dish or many other recipes that call for sauce or just for dipping.  This sauce really sticks to the pasta where others just surround it and it has a fresh Italian taste in many varieties and comes in large sizes so that you will have enough in one jar and if you don't use it all, you can refrigerate the rest in the jar and use it later.
summary: Francesco Rinaldi is the one you will love!

reviewText: a good tasting pasta sauce
I like the Rinaldi line of sauces, but did not find the "Marinara" to be one of my favorites.  There is nothing wrong with it, just a personal taste preference.
summary: Rinaldi Pasta sauces are good, this one is my least favorite

reviewText: I gave it five stars because it taste the best. the larger size feeds the whole family. the price is lower then the other brands. I would recommend this to everyone that loves great tasting pasta sauce.

i try this sauce and was happy with the product it a sauce that you can
add your own seasonsing to make it better which is fine with me plus it was
big jars and i only need 1 and a half so this was a win win for me,i save
money and i really enjoy the taste so WHAT not to like about this sauce
will buy more when i need it i might even subcrible,,just try it if you need
some sauce that cheap and taste even better after addedin your own
seasonsing...

I've never tried Rinaldi sauce but the description sounded good.  The ingredient list is simple and it doesn't contain high fructose corn syrup or thickeners, like many other cheap sauces.  The price was very low at about $2.50 per 45 ounce jar (almost twice as large as most jarred pasta sauces).

The price is great, but this is one of those times where you get what you pay for.  The sauce is thin and doesn't have a lot of flavor.  Luckily, a hefty sprinkle of parmesan cheese helped doctor it up.  I think it would be very good with the addition of some fresh mushrooms, olives, etc.  I would probably add some good crushed tomatoes to give it more tomato flavor. So, it has potential as a starter base!  It just doesn't stand on it's own as well as I would have liked.  It's ok for a budget sauce, but I'm not sure I'll buy it again.
summary: Not bad for a budget sauce

reviewText: HAVEN'T TRIED THE MARINARA YET. HOWEVER, WE HAVE HIGH HOPES THE TASTE AND QUALITY IS JUST AS GOOD AS THEIR BASIL HERB/TOMATO PASTA SAUCE.  NEVER HEARD OF THE BRAND BEFORE AND NOW MY SON AND DAUGHTER INTEND TO REPLACE THEIR RAGU WITH MORE COST EFFICIENT BRAND.
summary: francesco rinaldi tradiontal marinara pasta sauce

reviewText: I love the taste of this sauce.  I used it with pasta and with a chicken dish.  I did add extra spices because that's the way I like it. I will buy this sauce again.

I brought these chestnuts for Thanksgiving and everyone loved them.  You can use them also for chestnut stuffing and other recipes. Also, they are low in fat and healthy for you.

will order again!!
Love it!!
These are great!  Ready-peeled, easy to eat, soft and very tasty!  I will buy these again,

As a person who comes from the Transcaucasus region, where chestnuts are abundant and incredibly delicious I will tell you that finding good chestnuts in US is a difficult task. Even the freshest of the chestnuts bought at farmer's markets are always a disappointment. These have a very flat flavor, almost tasteless in my opinion. While I appreciate that they are from Italy and organic, the flavor is just not there. Gefen chestnuts, while not all that great, have a better taste. They are from China though which raises other concerns......
Better tasting than the competition but overcooked.  If they cooked this half of the time they used it would be the perfect chestnut out of a bag.
summary: Better tasting than the competition but overcooked

reviewText: So delicious, excellent! Def. buy again

These are highly addictive and I have been buying them for quite a few years. Ive tried many other brands and none compare to these. Most are very hard or small & flavorless. The only ones that compare are made by  mitica in Spain.
Ive also tried making my own and was only successful once. These are so convenient and decently priced. These are definitely a must try.
Excellent product. Great taste.  Fast shipment.

I was disappointed. I love chestnuts and buy them regularly. These are less sweet and chalkier than other brands I have tried. I bought these in bulk (won't do that again). I will eat them, but not with pleasure. I do like that these are not from China.

i don't write a great many reviews, and i certainly almost never write really glowing reviews -- but i felt compelled to in this case because these are the best-tasting packaged chestnuts i've ever eaten, and the closest thing to real i've yet found.  the quality is excellent, as well -- these arrived with a very fresh taste and texture.  in fact, i ate three packages in one afternoon, and will certainly purchase them again.

(i can't understand why some reviewers don't enjoy these; i suspect they don't have much experience with packaged chestnuts.)

if i didn't think it would make me sound like a total suck-up, i would say that i would add more stars if i could.

I have literally tried every brand of chestnuts on Amazon and these are the best. No it's not the same as roasting your own, but for a quick, healthy, nutritious snack these can't be beat. And yes they are expensive, but have you ever made chestnuts? It's a ridiculous amount of work.
taste like fresh, arrived with mostly whole chestnuts. will buy again. Tasty just as a snack too.
Good quality chestnuts
they are fantastic if a bit overpriced

Recipe w canned fruit n chestnut.  Add in bowl together n they r good.  The soft chestnuts go well with soft sweet fruit. These chestnuts grow on me.  My parrot loves them.

I would say these chestnut are vey healthy.
Edible and nutritious.  These are the best tasting packaged ones I've found.  They are still a far cry from fresh ones.
summary: These are the best tasting packaged ones I've found

reviewText: Good product

Excellent flavor!  This is the best brand  of packaged chestnuts I've tried yet.  Chestnuts add a nice variety for people who have to eat gluten free or who don't do well with grains.  Try a recipe for pureed chestnut soup; it's yummy.  I also like them warmed in water, mashed with the cooking water, salt and butter.

No fat. Low carbs and fibers. Makes the perfect snack. Amazing flavor!!! Very fresh. Easy to eat the whole bag in one sitting. Definitely will buy over and over. Takes a while to get to you but well w the wait.
worth the premium. much better than those chinese ones. they are expensive and smaller but the taste is much better and more reliable.
Great chestnuts for a good price and they are NOT from China! They make a great snack with few calories.
I love making afternoon 'iced coffee' from my leftover morning coffee. Everyone I have served absolutely loves this caramel flavoring. Thanks

This is really good syrup, better than what is available to me at local grocery stores. It is strong and a little goes a long way. Additional sweetener is not necessary when I put this in my coffee. So far, we have only used it in coffee, but I am planning to use it in other ways soon.
Love that it's made with sugar, not high fructose!

This is my favorite caramel syrup.  It is just as good as Starbucks and far superior to any other brand!
summary: This is my favorite caramel syrup

reviewText: Great for authentic caramel macchiatos!
Great caramel coffee syrup. Have ordered the four pack several times now.
Monin Caramel Flavored Syrup is used in many coffee shops for caramel lattes, but I'm not a huge fan.  It's sweet, but doesn't have a strong caramel flavor.  I prefer Starbucks or Torani.

Sam's Store in my are stopped selling the caramel and vanilla flavored syrup, so, I decided to try amazon's. Monin is a different brand from Sam's. It costs a little more, but comes in a larger bottle and I think the taste is a little better. The only thing I can think would improve this purchase would be if I could get two caramel and two vanilla in the 4 pack. But I understand, then, you would have to do more flavor's like that and that could become a nightmare.
summary: Super buy of Monin Flavored Syrup comes right to my front door with prime 2day ...Wonderful!!!

reviewText: This is a great product.  It has a great flavor.  I would highly recommend this over other flavored syrups. Enjoy!
